summary: 删除后付费的负载均衡实例。

schema.description:
负载均衡实例的地域ID。

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~27584~~)接口查询地域ID。

400.errorMessage: The prepay loadBalancer does not support this action.
The loadbalancer can not be deleted due to DeleteProtection is enabled.

You are not authorized to create the service linked role. Role Name: AliyunServiceRoleForSlbEipAccess. Service Name: eipaccess.slb.aliyuncs.com. Please ensure the user has been granted the ram:CreateServiceLinkedRole permission

title: 删除后付费的负载均衡实例
description: > 如果负载均衡实例上还有监听或者绑定了相应的标签，也会一并被删除。
